queries.name: query1
queries.query: avg:kubernetes.cpu.usage.total{($cluster AND $namespace AND kube_app_component:cluster-agent OR kube_app_instance:cluster-agent)} by {pod_name}.fill(null)

queries.name: query2
queries.query: avg:kubernetes.cpu.limits{($cluster AND $namespace AND kube_app_component:cluster-agent OR kube_app_instance:cluster-agent)} by {pod_name}.fill(null)

queries.name: query1
queries.query: avg:kubernetes.network.rx_bytes{($cluster AND $namespace AND kube_app_component:cluster-agent OR kube_app_instance:cluster-agent)} by {pod_name}.fill(null)

queries.name: query1
queries.query: avg:kubernetes.memory.usage{($cluster AND $namespace AND kube_app_component:cluster-agent OR kube_app_instance:cluster-agent)} by {pod_name}.fill(null)

queries.name: query2

queries.name: query1
queries.query: avg:kubernetes.containers.restarts{($cluster AND $namespace AND kube_app_component:cluster-agent OR kube_app_instance:cluster-agent)} by {pod_name}.fill(null)
